text: David Nixon is an American film director and film producer. He is the director and producer of Letters to God and a co-producer and assistant director of Fireproof and Facing the Giants.David Nixon - IMDb He is the creator of the film company Possibility Pictures and President of DNP StudiosFireproof - Taylor University News which has produced commercials for Subway Restaurants, Nickelodeon, the New York City Convention and Visitors Bureau, Campus Crusade and Walt Disney World. He is the son of missionaries in Australia. He graduated from Taylor University in 1979 with a degree in Biblical studies.Letters to God - MovieSet ==External links== *DNP Studios ==References== Category:American film directors Category:American film producers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
